Comment: Jointly with the Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to extending the rent stabilization laws.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution determining that a public emergency requiring rent control in the City of New York continues to exist and will continue to exist on and after April 1, 2006.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Determining that a public emergency requiring rent control in the City of New York continues to exist and will continue to exist on and after April 1, 2006.

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Krueger, S.2735, and Assembly Member Lopez, A.4523, “AN ACT to amend the local emergency housing rent control act, in relation to rent regulation laws”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on State and Federal Legislation
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to extending the rent stabilization laws.
